price: 168. Hadduu yahay agtannada xuskii (warkii) kuwii hore (Kitaab)22 .
arabic: لَوۡ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكۡرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: law anna ʿindanā dhik'ran mina al-awalīna
